typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fk_rsk_driver_grp_1 as long,
		fk_rsk_driver_grp_5 as long,
		fp_3_ltr_code as string,
		insert_date as date,
		pk_vessel_type_group as long,
		vsl_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select  fk_rsk_driver_grp_1,\n		fk_rsk_driver_grp_5,\n		fp_3_ltr_code,\n		insert_date,\n		pk_vessel_type_group,\n		vsl_desc \n  from dwh_stage.sta_vessel_type_group\nwhere fp_3_ltr_code is not null',
	format: 'query') ~> StaVesselTypeGroup
source(output(
		pk_risk_driver_group as long,
		table_name as string,
		group_name as string,
		group_code_alternative as string,
		group_desc_sort as string,
		group_code as string,
		group_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select  * \n  from dwh_stage.sta_risk_driver_group',
	format: 'query') ~> StaRiskDriverGroup
StaRiskDriverGroup select(mapColumn(
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code = group_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc = group_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort = group_desc_sort,
		pk_risk_driver_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RiskD1
StaVesselTypeGroup select(mapColumn(
		fk_rsk_driver_grp_1,
		fk_rsk_driver_grp_5,
		fp_3_ltr_code,
		insert_date,
		pk_vessel_type_group,
		vsl_desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VesslTypeGroup
VesslTypeGroup, RiskD1 join(fk_rsk_driver_grp_1 == pk_risk_driver_group,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RiskGroup1
StaRiskDriverGroup select(mapColumn(
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code = group_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_desc = group_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_sort = group_desc_sort,
		pk_risk_driver_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RiskD2
RiskGroup1 select(mapColumn(
		fk_rsk_driver_grp_5,
		vtg_key = fp_3_ltr_code,
		insert_date,
		pk_vessel_type_group,
		vsl_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort,
		pk_risk_driver_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, RiskD2 join(fk_rsk_driver_grp_5 == RiskD2@pk_risk_driver_group,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RiskGroup2
RiskGroup2 select(mapColumn(
		vtg_key,
		vtg_description = vsl_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_sort
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(vtg_main_group_level_1_code = toInteger(vtg_main_group_level_1_code),
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code = toInteger(vtg_main_group_level_2_code),
		inserted_by = 'm_pre_dim_vessel_type') ~> CovertingtoInt
CovertingtoInt sink(input(
		vtg_key as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code as integer,
		vtg_description as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_desc as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc as string,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code as integer,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_sort as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		vtg_key,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_sort,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_code,
		vtg_description,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_desc,
		vtg_main_group_level_1_code,
		vtg_main_group_level_2_sort
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VesselTypeGroup
